pair.value: Sends a task and email to remind the Investigator to review/update their details

acp.name: Subject
acp.a:expr: ="Reminder: please review/update your personal details in SiteConnect"

acp.name: BodyHTML
acp.a:expr:
=concatenate("

","Dear " & pv!principalInvestiatorDetails.firstName & " " & pv!principalInvestiatorDetails.lastName & ", Please review your personal details and update them if necessary. It is important to keep your details up to date. Link to task: "& pv!taskLink &" Thank you, SiteConnect.","

")

uiExpressionForm.expression: /*41707069616E-GEN*/#"_a-0000dcfa-ab37-8000-daab-640000640000_7127"( action: ac!action, isEdit: ac!isEdit, CTMS_USER: ac!CTMS_USER, selectedLicense: ac!selectedLicense, comment: ac!comment, reason: ac!reason, currentMilestone: ac!currentMilestone )

annotation.text: To ensure the task is generated before sending the email with task link, we wait, get the link, test if it's null, and repeat until not null. This ensures the task is generated and the link is valid.
We can chain this task into a user update task if they want, or link to the user record to allow them to review. For now the notification task just ends
